issue.title: [Rust] [Datafusion] Allow CAST from number to timestamp
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8117](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8117). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
With the current sqlparser version, timestamps cannot be parsed in queries. Upgrading datafusion to a new sqlparser version is a major change. In the meantime allow casting number to timestamp to allow selection on timestamp type columns.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8117?focusedCommentId=17059423) by Paddy Horan (paddyhoran):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6618
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6618>
